title: FocusGuard – Distraction Log
goal: Identify top 3 distraction triggers and propose realistic counter-measures.
why_it_matters: Productivity drops when students don’t know what distracts them most.
data: Short notes on distractions, optional tags (“phone”, “noise”).
ai: Pareto ranking to show top 20% triggers causing 80% loss.
workflow: One-click “Log distraction” widget collects short notes.
Texts clustered and visualized as a Pareto chart.
App suggests targeted fixes (e.g., silent hours, focus playlist).
outcome: Combines NLP + visualization + behavioral insights elegantly.
